testsuite.name: com.sample.modules.OfferPage
testsuite.system-out: Step 1 : Open URL - https://www.makemytrip.com/ Step 2 : Click on super offer tab in header. Step 3 : Verify offer page opened. Step 4 : Click on trending radio button. Step 5 : Click on icici checkbox. Step 6 : Verify all offers have icici bank logo with terms and conditions. PASS : verifyOfferPageTrendingICICIFilter

Step 1 : Open URL - https://www.makemytrip.com/ Step 2 : Click on super offer tab in header. Step 3 : Verify offer page opened. Step 4 : Click on flights radio button. Step 5 : Click on hdfc checkbox. Step 6 : Verify all offers have hdfc bank logo with terms and conditions. PASS : verifyOfferPageFlightsHDFCFilter

Step 1 : Open URL - https://www.makemytrip.com/ Step 2 : Click on super offer tab in header. Step 3 : Verify offer page opened. Step 4 : Click on hotels radio button. Step 5 : Click on axis checkbox. Step 6 : Verify all offers have axis bank logo with terms and conditions. PASS : verifyOfferPageHotelAxisFilter
